tool_description: Scans hair care product ingredients against known allergies, sensitivities, and common irritants to prevent adverse reactions.

ingredient_list.description: Complete ingredient list from product label

known_allergies.description: User's known allergic reactions to specific ingredients

sensitivity_history.description: Previous sensitivities or mild reactions experienced

skin_sensitivity_level.description: Overall skin/scalp sensitivity: low, moderate, or high

error_messages: Empty ingredient list: Must provide at least one ingredient to scan
Invalid sensitivity level: Sensitivity level must be low, moderate, or high
Ingredient format error: Ingredients should be provided as individual strings in array
usage: Provide the complete ingredient list from product packaging, any known allergies, previous sensitivity experiences, and your general skin sensitivity level.

safety_status.description: Overall safety assessment: safe, caution, or avoid

potential_irritants.description: Ingredients that may cause sensitivity reactions

common_allergens_present.description: Known common allergens found in the product

patch_test_recommended.description: Whether patch testing is advised before full use

safety_recommendations.description: Specific precautions to take when using this product
